pullRequest.title: Initial commit of step and timestep support for data retrieval

commit.message: Initial commit of step and timestep support for data retrieval
Added unconditional seek when applying timestep
Refactored to introduce FetchRequest to simplify signatures
Added support for step/timestep/sample/skip in SlicedRowFilterGTSDecoderIterator
Disabled use of filter when fetching by count with step/timestep/skip/sample
Added support for advanced fetch parameters in Warp10InputFormat

This one is tricky and took me a lot of time to debug:
If encoder has empty metadata (first metadata in the list) it is considered as a change of metadata. Thus it will not trigger the return in the if below and result will be processed. However, result will be also stored in pendingresult so it will be reprocessed, resulting in duplicate datapoints in the resulting decoder.
